Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Actively managed bond fund over passive ETFs. The problem is in the implementation of a bond index. Bond indices are honestly great but they are created without friction of trading costs and implementation.Active bond funds don't usually outperform their index, but a bond ETF never does. And between the 2 active bond funds tend to outperform bond ETFs net of fees.3 comments3
